title: HEEEELLLLPPP
body:
I can't  log in and have no idea how to fix it. It comes up saying "unable to join login queue. Check the server status here. If it looks good, follow the guide here" 
I've run it as an administrator, ran the hextech repair tool and restarted my computer so I'm out of ideas. Any help would be great.

replies.body: the post below you is saying the same thing m80.

I just have found a method to log in if u have problem "Unable to connect to the login queue". I just have played 2 games, so far no problem at all. We only have problem of login, we are fine for playing games so here is the method. But this method only suitable for user whose computer has WIFI.

1. Disconnect your LAN or pull the wire off if u r LAN user, and connect ur computer to "Personal Hotpot" of ur phone by WIFI
2. Open LOL and login, u will find that ur able to login
3. Disconnect Personal Hotpot then connect LAN or the WIFI u used to use
4. Wait client to reconnect then u r ready to go!
U will need to repeat dis method every single time u log in

GLHF!

We're currently aware of the issue, and [we're tracking it in this thread](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GNIFyg6h-login-issues-july-13th?comment=0006). There's a list of things that will help us to troubleshoot the problem - could you please check that out and post in that thread with your results?
